content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully constructed on the map. The agent made several attempts to craft and place a Research Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) – intended to supply Automation Science Packs for research – but repeated issues (such as missing inventory items and unavailable sub‑ingredients) prevented placement. In addition, while the logs show interactions with existing furnaces (an iron furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(–27.0, –60.0)) for smelting operations, these were not built in the current sequence but merely referenced from the game environment.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors (get_entities):
  – Use the correct function signature when calling get_entities. Avoid unsupported keyword arguments such as “radius” and do not supply positional parameters if none are expected.
  
• Null Iterable Handling:
  – Check that any function returning an entity list does not yield None before iterating over its results. Implement a fallback (e.g., default to an empty list) to prevent ‘NoneType’ iteration errors.
  
• Crafting Resource Deficiencies:
  – Before attempting to craft complex items (like a Lab), ensure that all required sub‑ingredients (for example, iron‑gear‑wheels, electronic‑circuits, and copper‑cables) are available through established production chains.
  
• Inventory Verification for Placement:
  – Always verify the inventory contains the item needed for placement (such as a Lab) prior to executing placement calls, to avoid errors indicating “No lab in inventory.”
